mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO TBL_BOOK ( BOOK_ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PRICE, IMAGE, QUANTITY, CATEGORY, EBOOK ) VALUES ( #{item.isbn}, #{item.title}, #{item.description}, #{item.author}, #{item.publisher}, #{item.price}, #{item.image}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.category}, #{item.ebook} )
SELECT * FROM dual
